scripts.build: npm run --if-present build:pre && npm run build:run && npm run --if-present build:post
scripts.build:pre: npm run build:pre:local-dependencies && npm run build:pre:watch
scripts.build:run: npm run build:run:tsup && npm run build:run:babel && npm run build:run:webpack
scripts.build:run:babel: cross-env build_tool=babel module_format=commonjs babel src --ignore **/*.spec.js,**/*.test.js,__tests__/**/*.js --out-dir lib --verbose
scripts.build:run:webpack: npm run build:run:webpack:development && npm run build:run:webpack:production
scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && (npm audit fix || exit 0)
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $P | (.localDependencies // {} | keys) as $L | (.devDependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | contains([$K]) | not)) | map(.key + "@" + ($P[.key] // ["latest"])[0]) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $P | (.localDependencies // {} | keys) as $L | (.dependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | contains([$K]) | not)) | map(.key + "@" + ($P[.key] // ["latest"])[0]) | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install --save-exact $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
